name: Ready to Anything
description:
What makes a hero is his stuff, right? Well, know that you ARE equipped, and WELL EQUIPPED! In fact, you are ready. Ready to anything!!

In this game, you'll have to progress in a dungeon filled with monsters (and maybe one day also with traps). But be warned: you'll have to make sacrifices in order to continue your progression.

It is not finished, as we didn't have enough time to do all we wanted, but we hope you'll have some fun testing what we've done, as we had a lot of fun doing it! ^^
